enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding listeners for specific message types (requests and indications) and involve similar state changes in the EventDispatcher.
Both methods involve setting up listeners or handlers for network events, indicating a similar dependency on network state.
Both methods involve handling incoming messages and dispatching them to appropriate listeners, suggesting similar behavior in message handling.
The removal of a request listener is the inverse operation of adding one, suggesting a similar pattern in managing listeners.
